Pre-Game Insights: England wanted to impose themselves as an attacking force
There was a goal for Ivan Toney on his full debut from the penalty spot
Kobbie Mainoo provided a virtuoso performance and made a serious case to join the squad for the European Championship
There was the fighting spirit which saw England go until the very end
Post-Match Reflections: Southgate defended picking John Stones despite injury against Belgium
Jude Bellingham said Mainoo played well but expressed caution about public pressure
Bellingham stated that the two games will stand them in good stead for the Euros
Bellingham mentioned that Southgate planned a fully fit team and was glad to see the players he got to see
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jude Bellingham rescued England with a last-gasp equaliser
Mainoo played well but there were concerns about the defensive frailty
Belgiumâ€™s Tintin-inspired away kit was noted
John Stones' injury completed a bad few days for Manchester City defenders in England shirts
